title: Opinion: What I’ve learned by mapping the impacts of NIH cuts
description: The co-founder of SCIMaP looks at the year of NIH cuts — and what they say about the future of American research.
content: The co-founder of SCIMaP looks at the year of NIH cuts — and what they say about the future of American research.
